meanings.definition: To move with a splashing sound
meanings.sent1: The water was sloshing in the bucket as I carried it.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the milk sloshing in the jug.
meanings.sent3: The sloshing water made a rhythmic beat against the sides of the pail.
meanings.sent4: The leaves sloshing in the wind sounded like a gentle rain.
meanings.sent5: The sloshing of the waves against the shore was calming.

meanings.definition: The sound of liquid moving around in a container
meanings.sent1: The sloshing of the drink in the cup was loud.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the sloshing of the water in the bottle.
meanings.sent3: The sloshing of the soup in the pot sounded like music.
meanings.sent4: The sloshing of the oil in the pan was a symphony of sizzles.
meanings.sent5: The sloshing of the river against the rocks was soothing.
